title: Data
text:
[Data source] (Football teams | Rankings | Stats (kaggle.com))



# we didnt need any preprocessing since our data doesnt have any NA values

# we imported data by selecting file>import dataset



summary(data)

head
head(data)
corplot

install.packages("corrplot")
install.packages("tidyverse")
install.packages("dplyr")

library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
library(corrplot)
data <- as.data.frame(data)
# correlation plotu için numerik olan değişkenler filtrelendi
data_num <- select_if(data, is.numeric)
# correlation
corr <- cor(data_num)
# plot
corrplot(corr,tl.col = 'black')
box
# rating boxplot
boxplot(Rating~Tournament,data=data,col=c("red","pink","lightblue","yellow","purple"))
points(1:4,tapply(data$Rating,data$Tournament,mean,na.rm=TRUE),pch=4)#
